name: coffeekraken-gridle

scripts.demo: npm run demo.css && npm run demo.js && open http://localhost:8080/demo.html && npm run demo.server
scripts.demo.css: node-sass demo/src/sass/style.scss demo/dist/css/style.css && node-sass demo/src/sass/grid.scss demo/dist/css/grid.css && node-sass demo/src/sass/grid-flex.scss demo/dist/css/grid-flex.css
scripts.demo.watch.css: nodemon -w demo/src -w src -e scss -x "npm run demo.css"
scripts.demo.watch.js: nodemon -w demo/src -w src -e js -x "npm run demo.js"
scripts.doc: rm -rf doc/src && npm run doc.scss && npm run doc.js
